Title: Xiao, the Eater
Description:
You may have already met my best student, Xiao, at the banquet tables. I personally would have graduated him several times over, but Instructor Xann insists that he needs more discipline.

If you ask me, discipline means very little if you win every fight you enter. I'm curious to see if Xiao can keep his streak alive against you.
ObjectivesText: Challenge and defeat Xiao at the Tian Monastery.
PortraitGiverText: Caution: has been known to throw his food.
CompletionText: Young Xiao has a great future in martial arts. I wish you luck in your upcoming match.
RewardText: I must admit, I was never surprised, $r. You are a born fighter, and an excellent $c.
